resources.string: Welcome, by selecting HIGH you will have a higher precision but a less optimal battery use, by selecting LOW you will have a lower precision but a better battery use. THE CHOICE IS YOURS!
Without active permissions, the app will not function properly.
"To have high accuracy, GPS must be enabled."
" Hi, we need your permission to use the internet to have a correct geolocation."
Hello! To locate your device, we need you to authorize us to access the location.
"Permission denied, unable to use the app "
